name: Magical Defender
description:
Magical Girl save the vilager from Spirit monster.
spirit monster cannot be attaked by physical .
Magical girl have idea to build element magic tower to attack  spirit monster .

Control 

  • A : move To left.
  • D : move to right.
  • Right Mouse : Dash.
    Left Mouse : Build Tower /Buy Card.
    Press 1,2,3,4 to Choose choose Tower Element
